braille-utils.api 5.1.0 API

Provides interfaces for embossing, creating and manipulating PEF-files.

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
org.daisy.braille.utils.api.embosser
Provides interfaces and classes needed to implement embossers.
org.daisy.braille.utils.api.factory
Provides factory classes for coexisting implementations of a certain type.
org.daisy.braille.utils.api.paper
Provides interfaces and classes needed to implement papers.
org.daisy.braille.utils.api.table
Provides interfaces and classes needed to implement braille tables.

Provides interfaces for embossing, creating and manipulating PEF-files. The API supports both SPI and OSGi runtime contexts.

Providing implementations

The following interfaces have been constructed so that they can be discovered as SPI and OSGi services:

  • org.daisy.braille.utils.api.embosser.EmbosserProvider
  • org.daisy.braille.utils.api.embosser.EmbosserCatalogService
  • org.daisy.braille.utils.api.table.TableProvider
  • org.daisy.braille.utils.api.table.TableCatalogService
  • org.daisy.braille.utils.api.paper.PaperProvider
  • org.daisy.braille.utils.api.paper.PaperCatalogService
  • org.daisy.braille.utils.api.validator.ValidatorProvider
  • org.daisy.braille.utils.api.validator.ValidatorFactoryService

While all of the above may be discovered by SPI or OSGi, the following interfaces provide a starting point for a developer who wishes to add support for additional embossers:

  • org.daisy.braille.utils.api.embosser.EmbosserProvider
  • org.daisy.braille.utils.api.table.TableProvider
  • org.daisy.braille.utils.api.paper.PaperProvider

Implementations bundled with the API

Default implementations of the following interfaces are included:

  • org.daisy.braille.utils.api.embosser.EmbosserCatalogService
  • org.daisy.braille.utils.api.paper.PaperCatalogService
  • org.daisy.braille.utils.api.table.TableCatalogService
  • org.daisy.braille.utils.api.validator.ValidatorFactoryService

In an OSGi context, an implementation is retrieved from the service registry using these interfaces.

In an SPI context, the implementations can be accessed directly:

  • org.daisy.braille.utils.api.embosser.EmbosserCatalog
  • org.daisy.braille.utils.api.paper.PaperCatalog
  • org.daisy.braille.utils.api.table.TableCatalog
  • org.daisy.braille.utils.api.validator.ValidatorFactory
